description.narrative:
MFA has launched a call for proposals for NGOs in support of vulnerable groups among refugees, internally displaced people and affected local communities in eastern Africa and the Horn of Africa with a deadline for incoming proposals 10 August 2021. NGOs can submit full proposals to the call according to the Information Note and annexes shared on the MFA website (https://um.dk/da/danida/samarbejspartnere/civ-org/stoetteform/tematiske-ngo-runder/).
The Department of Humanitarian Action, Civil Society and Engagement (HCE) intends to employ a Consultant to support the assessment and scoring of incoming proposals. The assignment is to be carried out in Denmark in accordance with the Ministry’s Procurement Guidelines.
The purpose of the assignment is to carry out a preliminary assessment and scoring of the incoming proposals in support of the MFA Assessment Committee.
The objective of the assignment is to score all proposals and provide an overview of incoming proposals in order for the MFA Assessment Committee to recommend how the proposals should be prioritised.
NGO call for proposals in support of vulnerable groups among refugees, internally displaced people and affected local communities in eastern Africa and the Horn of Africa.
